cd CMSSW_5_3_32/src
cmsenv

Note
To extract the exact LHE configuration, you can use the following script available in the CMS working environment on the CMS Open Data VM: 

$ dumpLHEHeader.py input=file:somefile.root output=testout.lhe
where "somefile.foot" is one of the root files in this dataset. For example, in the existing working area, you can read the generator information directly from any of the root files of this dataset on the CERN Open Data area (the path to the root files is available from the file index of the record): 
cd CMSSW_5_3_32/src
cmsenv
dumpLHEHeader.py input=file:root://eospublic.cern.ch//eos/opendata/cms/MonteCarlo2011/Summer11LegDR/TTJets_MSDecays_dileptonic_matchingdown_7TeV-madgraph-tauola/AODSIM/PU_S13_START53_LV6_ext1-v1/60000/0282B13B-490E-E511-8E8A-001E67A3EF70.root output=testout.lhe

files.description: /Vector1MToZZTo4L_M-125p6_7TeV-JHUGenV3-pythia6/Summer11LegDR-PU_S13_START53_LV6-v1/AODSIM dataset file index (1 of 1) for access to data via CMS virtual machine

methodology.description:
These data were processed in several steps:

Step LHE
Release: CMSSW_4_1_8_patch14
Global tag: START311_V2::All
Configuration file for LHE step HIG-Summer11pLHE-00063_1_cfg.py
Output dataset: /Vector1MToZZTo4L_M-125p6_7TeV-JHUGenV3-pythia6/Summer11-START311_V2-v1/GEN

Note
To extract the exact LHE configuration, you can use the following script available in the CMS working environment on the CMS Open Data VM: 

$ dumpLHEHeader.py input=file:somefile.root output=testout.lhe
where "somefile.foot" is one of the root files in this dataset. For example, in the existing working area, you can read the generator information directly from any of the root files of this dataset on the CERN Open Data area (the path to the root files is available from the file index of the record): 
cd CMSSW_5_3_32/src
cmsenv
dumpLHEHeader.py input=file:root://eospublic.cern.ch//eos/opendata/cms/MonteCarlo2011/Summer11LegDR/TTJets_MSDecays_dileptonic_matchingdown_7TeV-madgraph-tauola/AODSIM/PU_S13_START53_LV6_ext1-v1/60000/0282B13B-490E-E511-8E8A-001E67A3EF70.root output=testout.lhe

Step SIM
Release: CMSSW_5_3_22_patch1
Global tag: START53_LV4::All
Configuration file for SIM step HIG-Summer11Leg-00151_1_cfg.py
Output dataset: /Vector1MToZZTo4L_M-125p6_7TeV-JHUGenV3-pythia6/Summer11Leg-START53_LV4-v1/GEN-SIM

Step HLT RECO
Release: CMSSW_5_3_29
Global tag: START53_LV6::All
Configuration file for HLT step HIG-Summer11LegDR-00284_1_cfg.py
Configuration file for RECO step HIG-Summer11LegDR-00284_2_cfg.py
Output dataset: /Vector1MToZZTo4L_M-125p6_7TeV-JHUGenV3-pythia6/Summer11LegDR-PU_S13_START53_LV6-v1/AODSIM

note.description: These simulated datasets correspond to the collision data collected by the CMS experiment in 2011.

pileup.description: To make these simulated data comparable with the collision data, pile-up events are added to the simulated event in this step.
